channel.title: Cache issue
channel.description:
Hello,
I have returned from a rather long absense to this forum and I am trying to play around with a private server. However; nearly all of the clients I download require a cache to be installed and I can not seem to figure out how to do it properly. Can someone help me? Thanks.
TL;DR: How do I install a cache? (I'm trying to run the [url=http://uppit.com/xkwyy3mj068a/Destortion_Package.rar]Destortion client[/url]: for those who are familiar).

item.title: Cache issue
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

Download the cache and place the cache folder into your (C:) drive. Most of them have autocache downloaders that automatically install to the (C:) unless the link is removed.

Read full topic
